Remote Summon (Permanent Units):#284 Wolf x 30
Cannot trace range through seas :1
Remote summon commander :#633 Werewolf
Cannot target geo mask : (Sea)
Summons a werewolf and a large pack of wolves in a distant land. The werewolf is under the command of its summoner.
This spell is only half as effective when a non forest province is targeted.
